answers.author: Michael Conduff
answers.text:
Hi Pam - great photo!  Several of the cities we help with sustainability are utilizing their state statutes for Performance Contracting to capture energy savings and apply those (usually over 15 years or so) to finance LED and Induction lighting.  This is a "no $ out of pocket" way to get energy upgrades.  I will ask a couple of our sustainability partners about statutes, etc in CA.  
Great to see you in Albuquerque!
Mike Conduff
940-453-3116
Mike.Conduff@TheElimGroup.com

text:
LA County, CA is looking for information re: funding for LED lighting for their beaches and harbors.  Please send your thoughts, ideas, studies, funding resources, etc. re: LED lighting for public areas, beaches and the like.  
Thank you,
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
